mapper.update: update contr_devices set cd_id = #{cdId}, cd_seqno = #{cdSeqno}, co_id = #{coId}, port_id = #{portId}, dn_id = #{dnId}, eq_id = #{eqId}, cd_status = #{cdStatus}, cd_activ_date = #{cdActivDate}, cd_deactiv_date = #{cdDeactivDate}, cd_validfrom = #{cdValidfrom}, cd_entdate = #{cdEntdate}, cd_moddate = #{cdModdate}, cd_userlastmod = #{cdUserlastmod}, cd_sm_num = #{cdSmNum}, cd_channels = #{cdChannels}, cd_channels_excl = #{cdChannelsExcl}, cd_eq_num = #{cdEqNum}, cd_pending_state = #{cdPendingState}, cd_rs_id = #{cdRsId}, cd_plcode = #{cdPlcode}, hlcode = #{hlcode}, rec_version = #{recVersion} where cd_id = #{cdId};
